text: Olga is our Teamlead. She prepared the structure of the project, wrote documentation about the project's interfaces and made most of the reviews. She implemented footer and this modal section with a slider about our team, also wrote functions for working with API, and refactored the project to connect all the parts. 'Add to library' buttons are also made by Olga.

Hanna is our Scrum Master. Thanks to her, Daily standup meetings were held smoothly, efficiently and at a time convenient for all the team members. She made functionality and styles for rendering movie cards as well as for errors notification.
Aleksandr implemented loading of popular movies, prepared style variables for all project. Implementation of logic with library buttons in header and nice favicon are also his merit.
Oleksandra implemented modal window with information about movie.
Natalia wrote functions for working with local storage and added nice button, which helps users easily get to site's top.
Maxim prepared styles for main container and implemented search functionality on our website.
Serhii implemented important part of functionality: he added pagination to our results.
Tatiana wrote styles and functionality for site's header. Prepared all images and helped with bugfixing.
